messages.Main.error.deleteFollowing:
Faulty CATS installation found!
To fix this delete the following files and folders inside your addons folder:

Faulty CATS installation found!
Please install CATS via User Preferences and restart Blender!
messages.Main.error.restartAndEnable:
Faulty CATS installation was found and fixed!
Please restart Blender and enable CATS again!
messages.Main.error.29unsupportedVersion:
Blender versions older than 3.6 are not supported by Cats.
Please use Blender 3.6 or later.
messages.Main.error.40unsupportedVersion:
Blender 4.0 is not supported by this version of cats.
Please use Blender 4.1, you can download a 4.1 version on my github.
messages.Main.error.restartAndEnable_alt: Please restart Blender and enable CATS again!

messages.MMDOptions.RemoveRigidBodiesManaulInfo2: Which are not needed for VRChat
messages.FixMaterialsButton.label: Fix Materials
messages.FixMaterialsButton.desc:
This will apply some vrchat related fixes to materials

- You shouldn't use this if your model has already 
been set up for Unity.
- Don't use this if your materials go black, though 
a lot of issues have been fixed when it comes to materials
there may be some left.

messages.ModelSettings.warn.fbtFix3: It's still available in Legacy Features.

messages.CustomPanel.warn.noArmOrMesh1: An armature and a mesh are required!
messages.CustomPanel.warn.noArmOrMesh2: Make sure that the mesh has no parent.

messages.DecimationPanel.safeModeDesc: Decent results - No shape key loss
messages.DecimationPanel.halfModeDesc: Good results - Minimal shape key loss
messages.DecimationPanel.fullModeDesc: Consistent results - Full shape key loss

messages.DecimationPanel.warn.emptyList: Both lists are empty, this equals Full Decimation!
messages.DecimationPanel.warn.correctWhitelist: Both whitelists are considered during decimation

messages.EyeTrackingPanel.label: Eye Tracking
messages.EyeTrackingPanel.error.wrongNameArm1: Your armature has to be named 'Armature'
messages.EyeTrackingPanel.error.wrongNameBody1: The mesh containing the eyes has to be
messages.EyeTrackingPanel.error.wrongNameBody2: named 'Body' for Eye Tracking to work!
messages.VisemePanel.label: Visemes
messages.BoneRootPanel.label: Bone Parenting
messages.Av3EyeTrackingPanel.info2: is now setup in Unity this will
messages.Av3EyeTrackingPanel.info3: Rotate eyes up to simplify setup
messages.Av3EyeTrackingRotateEyeBones.label: Rotate eye bones
messages.Av3EyeTrackingRotateEyeBones.desc: Rotate eye bones to point straight up with zero roll. This simplifies setting up VRChat Avatars 3.0 eye tracking in Unity
messages.Av3EyeTrackingRotateEyeBones.poll.notInC: {armature} is not in the current Edit mode, either exit the current Edit mode or open {armature} in Edit mode
messages.Av3EyeTrackingRotateEyeBones.info.noChan: Eye bones are already rotated for VRChat, no changes were made.

messages.LegacyEyeTrackingPanel.info2: this should NOT be used for VRChat as
messages.LegacyEyeTrackingPanel.info3: as eye tracking for VRChat is set up
messages.LegacyEyeTrackingPanel.info4: in Unity. This is for other games that
messages.LegacyEyeTrackingPanel.info5: that need this system still like ChilloutVR.
messages.Scene.eye_left.label: Left Eye
messages.Scene.eye_right.label: Right Eye
messages.Scene.removerigidbodiesjointsglobal.desc:
Removes all Rigidbodies and Joints from the scene whenever a button is used
This is on by default as if rigidbodies collections are not removed it can cause issues.
Only turn off if you need rigid bodies persevered for MMD reasons.
messages.FixLegacy.info1: Fix Model Button has been removed.
messages.FixLegacy.info2: please see mmd options for alternatives.

messages.OptimizePanel.matCombOutdated6: Or download and install it manually:

messages.ScalingPanel.imscaleDisabled2: Enable it in your user preferences:
messages.UpdaterPanel.label: Settings & Updates
messages.UpdaterPanel.name: Settings:
messages.UpdaterPanel.requireRestart2: Some changes require a Blender restart.
messages.CreditsPanel.label: Credits
messages.CreditsPanel.desc6: Do you need help or found a bug?
messages.FixArmature.label: Fix MMD Model
messages.FixArmature.desc:
WARNING: DO NOT USE THIS UNLESS YOU ARE
IMPORTING A NEW MMD MODEL, DO NOT USE 
THIS FOR MODELS ALREADY SET UP FOR 
UNITY AND VRCHAT!

Automatically:
- Reparents bones
- Removes unnecessary bones, objects, groups & constraints
- Translates and renames bones & objects
- Merges weight paints
- Corrects the hips
- Converts morphs into shapes
messages.FixArmature.warning.line1: Please note: This function is only for models not set up for Unity,
messages.FixArmature.warning.line2: such as MMD models. Do not use on Booth or Gumroad models, as it
messages.FixArmature.warning.line4: Ensure you've imported the model via the Cats importer. If not,
messages.FixArmature.warning.line5: please re-import using the Cats importer, or blender will crash.
messages.FixArmature.error.noMesh:
No mesh inside the armature found!
If there are meshes outside of the armature,
set the armature as the parent of the meshes.
messages.FixArmature.error.faultyUV1: The model was successfully fixed, but there were {uvcoord} faulty UV coordinates.
messages.FixArmature.error.faultyUV2: This could result in broken textures and you might have to fix them manually.
messages.FixArmature.error.faultyUV3: This issue is often caused by edits in PMX editor.
messages.FixArmature.bonesNotFound: The following bones were not found:
messages.FixArmature.cantFix1: Looks like you found a model which Cats could not fix!
messages.FixArmature.cantFix2: If this is a non-modified model we would love to make it compatible.
messages.FixArmature.cantFix3: Report it to us in the forum or in our discord, links can be found in the Credits panel.
messages.FixArmature.notParent: is not parented at all, this will cause problems!
messages.StartPoseMode.label: Start Pose Mode
messages.StartPoseMode.desc:
Starts the pose mode.
This lets you test how your model will move
messages.StartPoseModeNoReset.desc:
Starts the pose mode without resetting the pose.
This lets you test how your model will move
messages.StopPoseMode.label: Stop Pose Mode
messages.StopPoseMode.desc: Stops the pose mode and resets the pose to normal
messages.StopPoseModeNoReset.desc: Stops the pose mode and keeps the current pose
messages.PoseToShape.label: Pose to Shape Key
messages.PoseToShape.desc:
This saves your current pose as a new shape key.
The new shape key will be at the bottom of your shape key list of the mesh
messages.PoseNamePopup.label: Give this shapekey a name:
messages.PoseNamePopup.desc: Sets the shapekey name. Press anywhere outside to skip
messages.PoseNamePopup.success: Pose successfully saved as shape key.
messages.PoseToRest.label: Apply as Rest Pose
messages.PoseToRest.desc: This applies the current pose position as the new rest position.
messages.PoseToRest.success: Pose successfully applied as rest pose.
messages.JoinMeshes.label: Join Meshes
messages.JoinMeshes.desc:
Joins all meshes of this model together.
It also:
  - Reorders all shape keys correctly
  - Applies all transforms
  - Repairs broken armature modifiers
  - Applies all decimation and mirror modifiers
  - Merges UV maps correctly
messages.JoinMeshesSelected.label: Join Selected Meshes
messages.JoinMeshesSelected.desc:
Joins all selected meshes of this model together.
It also:
  - Reorders all shape keys correctly
  - Applies all transforms
  - Repairs broken armature modifiers
  - Applies all decimation and mirror modifiers
  - Merges UV maps correctly
messages.JoinMeshesSelected.error.noSelect: No meshes selected! Please select the meshes you want to join in the hierarchy!
messages.JoinMeshesSelected.error.cantJoin: Selected meshes could not be joined!
messages.JoinMeshes.error.not_single_user: Your Objects/ Meshes are not Single User
messages.JoinMeshes.error.make_single_user: Please do this before using this option
messages.JoinMeshes.error.make_single_user1: Select all Objest/ Mehses then do
messages.SeparateByMaterials.label: Separate by Materials
messages.SeparateByMaterials.desc:
Separates selected mesh by materials.

Warning: Never decimate something where you might need the shape keys later (face, mouth, eyes..)
messages.SeparateByLooseParts.label: Separate by Loose Parts
messages.SeparateByLooseParts.desc:
Separates selected mesh by loose parts.
This acts like separating by materials but creates more meshes for more precision
messages.SeparateByShapekeys.label: Separate by Shape Keys
messages.SeparateByShapekeys.desc:
Separates selected mesh into two parts,
depending on whether it is affected by a shape key or not.

Very useful for manual decimation
messages.SeparateByX.error.multipleMesh:
Multiple meshes found!
Please select the mesh you want to separate!
messages.SeparateByX.warn.noSeparation: No meshes had to be separated!
messages.MergeWeights.label: Merge Weights to Parent
messages.MergeWeights.desc:
Deletes the selected bones and adds their weight to their respective parents.

Only available in Edit or Pose Mode with bones selected
messages.MergeWeights.success: Deleted {number} bones and added their weights to their parents.
messages.MergeWeightsToActive.label: Merge Weights to Active
messages.MergeWeightsToActive.desc:
Deletes the selected bones except the active one and adds their weights to the active bone.
The active bone is the one you selected last.

Only available in Edit or Pose Mode with bones selected
messages.MergeWeightsToActive.success: Deleted {number} bones and added their weights to the active bone.
messages.ApplyTransformations.label: Apply Transformations
messages.ApplyTransformations.desc: Applies the position, rotation and scale to the armature and it's meshes
messages.ApplyAllTransformations.label: Apply All Transformations
messages.ApplyAllTransformations.desc: Applies the position, rotation and scale of all objects
messages.RemoveZeroWeightBones.label: Remove Zero Weight Bones
messages.RemoveZeroWeightBones.desc:
Cleans up the bones hierarchy, deleting all bones that don't directly affect any vertices
Don't use this if you plan to use 'Fix Model'
messages.RemoveZeroWeightGroups.label: Remove Zero Weight Vertex Groups
messages.RemoveZeroWeightGroups.desc: Cleans up the vertex groups of all meshes, deleting all groups that don't directly affect any vertices
messages.RemoveConstraints.label: Remove Bone Constraints
messages.RemoveConstraints.desc: Removes constrains between bones causing specific bone movement as these are not used by VRChat
messages.RecalculateNormals.label: Recalculate Normals
messages.RecalculateNormals.desc:
Makes normals point inside of the selected mesh.

Don't use this on good looking meshes as this can screw them up.
Use this if there are random inverted or darker faces on the mesh
messages.FlipNormals.label: Flip Normals
messages.FlipNormals.desc:
Flips the direction of the faces' normals of the selected mesh.
Use this if all normals are inverted
messages.RemoveDoubles.label: Remove Doubles
messages.RemoveDoubles.desc:
Merges duplicated faces and vertices of the selected meshes.
This is safer than doing it manually:
 - leaves shape keys completely untouched
 - but removes less doubles overall
messages.RemoveDoublesNormal.label: Remove Doubles Normally
messages.RemoveDoublesNormal.desc:
Merges duplicated faces and vertices of the selected meshes.
This is exactly like doing it manually
messages.FixVRMShapesButton.label: Fix Koikatsu Shapekeys
messages.FixVRMShapesButton.desc: Fixes the shapekeys of Koikatsu models
messages.DuplicateBonesButton.label: Duplicate Bones
messages.DuplicateBonesButton.desc: Duplicates the selected bones including their weight and renames them to _L and _R
messages.MergeArmature.label: Merge Armatures
messages.MergeArmature.desc:
Merges the selected merge armature into the base armature.
You should fix both armatures with Cats first.
Only move the mesh of the merge armature to the desired position, the bones will be moved automatically
messages.MergeArmature.error.notFound: The armature "{name}" could not be found.
messages.MergeArmature.error.checkTransforms:
Please make sure that the parent of the merge armature has the following transforms:
 - Location at 0
 - Rotation at 0
 - Scale at 1
messages.MergeArmature.warning.nonStandardArmatur: Non-standard armature detected. If this is an MMD/VRM model or a model not set up for Unity, please consider using the 'Fix MMD Model' function. If not, press OK to continue with the merge. We cannot guarantee the merge will work though. If the mesh is not in the correct location afterwards, please only move the mesh (not the armature) to the desired position.
messages.AttachMesh.label: Attach Mesh
messages.AttachMesh.desc:
Attaches the selected mesh to the selected bone of the selected armature.

INFO: The mesh will only be assigned to the selected bone.
E.g.: A jacket won't work, because it requires multiple bones
messages.CustomModelTutorialButton.label: How to use
messages.merge_armatures.error.transformReset:
If you want to rotate the new part, only modify the mesh instead of the armature,
or select "Apply Transforms"!

The transforms of the merge armature got reset and the mesh you have to modify got selected.
Now place this selected mesh where and how you want it to be and then merge the armatures again.
If you don't want that, undo this operation.
messages.merge_armatures.error.pleaseUndo: Something went wrong! Please undo, check your selections and try again.
messages.EnableSMC.label: Enable Material Combiner
messages.AtlasHelpButton.label: Generate Material List
messages.InstallShotariya.label: Error while loading Material Combiner:
messages.InstallShotariya.error.install2: The plugin 'Material Combiner' by Shotariya is required for this function.
messages.InstallShotariya.error.install3: Please download and install it manually:
messages.InstallShotariya.error.enable2: The plugin 'Material Combiner' by Shotariya is required for this function.
messages.InstallShotariya.error.enable3: Please enable it in your User Preferences.
messages.InstallShotariya.error.version2: The latest version is required for this function.
messages.InstallShotariya.error.version3: Please download and install it manually:
messages.ShotariyaButton.label: Download Material Combiner
messages.ImmersiveScalerButton.label: Download Immersive Scaler
messages.ImmersiveScalerHelpButton.label: Immersive Scaler Help
messages.EnableIMScale.label: Enable Immersive Scaler
messages.BoneMergeButton.label: Merge Bones
messages.BoneMergeButton.desc:
Merges the given percentage of bones together.
This is useful to reduce the amount of bones used by Dynamic Bones.
messages.ShowError.label: Report: Error
messages.ForumButton.label: Go to the Forums
messages.HelpButton.label: Need Help?
messages.LegacyReadButton.label: Legacy features wiki
messages.MMDOptionswiki.label: MMD Options Wiki
messages.PatchnotesButton.label: Latest Patchnotes
messages.ScanButton.label: Scan for decimation models
messages.AddShapeButton.label: Add
messages.AddShapeButton.desc:
Adds the selected shape key to the whitelist.
This means that every mesh containing that shape key will be not decimated.
messages.AddMeshButton.label: Add
messages.AddMeshButton.desc:
Adds the selected mesh to the whitelist.
This means that this mesh will be not decimated.
messages.RemoveShapeButton.label: Remove Shapekey
messages.RemoveShapeButton.desc:
Removes the selected shape key from the whitelist.
This means that this shape key is no longer decimation safe!
messages.RemoveMeshButton.label: Remove Mesh
messages.RemoveMeshButton.desc:
Removes the selected mesh from the whitelist.
This means that this mesh will be decimated.
messages.AutoDecimateCatsButton.label: Quick Decimation
messages.AutoDecimateCatsButton.desc:
This will automatically decimate your model while preserving the shape keys.
You should manually remove unimportant meshes first.
messages.decimate.cantDecimateWithSettings: This model can not be decimated to {number} tris with the specified settings.
messages.decimate.safeTryOptions: Try to use Custom, Half or Full Decimation.
messages.decimate.halfTryOptions: Try to use Custom or Full Decimation.
messages.decimate.customTryOptions: Select fewer shape keys and/or meshes or use Full Decimation.
messages.decimate.disableFingersOrIncrease: Disable 'Save Fingers' or increase the Tris Count.
messages.decimate.noDecimationNeeded: The model already has less than {number} tris. Nothing had to be decimated.
messages.decimate.cantDecimate1: The model could not be decimated to {number} tris.
messages.decimate.cantDecimate2: It got decimated as much as possible within the limits.
messages.ImportAnyModel.label: Import Any Model
messages.ImportAnyModel.importantInfo.label: IMPORTANT INFO (hover here)
messages.ImportAnyModel.importantInfo.desc: If you want to modify the import settings, use the button next to the Import button.
messages.ImportAnyModel.error.emptyZip: The selected zip file contains no importable models.
messages.ImportAnyModel.desc2.8:
Import a model of any supported type.

Supported types:
- MMD: .pmx/.pmd
- XNALara: .xps/.mesh/.ascii
- Source: .smd/.qc/.vta/.dmx
- VRM: .vrm
- FBX: .fbx
- DAE: .dae 
- ZIP: .zip
messages.DecimationMoved1.info3: using tuxedo instead as this is
messages.LegacyDecimationButton.label: Get Tuxedo!
messages.DecimationHelpButton.label: Decimation Wiki
messages.ImportAnyModel.error.unsupportedFBX:
The FBX file version is unsupported!
Please use a tool such as the "Autodesk FBX Converter" to make it compatible.
messages.ZipPopup.label: Zip Model Selection:
messages.ZipPopup.desc: Shows the models contained in the zip files
messages.ZipPopup.selectModel1: Select which model you want to import
messages.ModelsPopup.label: Select which you want to import:
messages.ImportMMD.label: MMD
messages.ImportXPS.label: XNALara
messages.ImportSource.label: Source
messages.ImportFBX.label: FBX
messages.ImportVRM.label: VRM
messages.InstallXPS.label: XPS Tools is not installed or enabled!
messages.InstallSource.label: Source Tools is not installed or enabled!
messages.InstallVRM.label: VRM Importer is not installed or enabled!
messages.InstallX.pleaseInstall1: If it is not enabled please enable it in your User Preferences.
messages.InstallX.pleaseInstall2: If it is not installed please download and install it manually.
messages.InstallX.pleaseInstall3: Make sure to install the version for Blender {blenderVersion}
messages.InstallX.pleaseInstallTesting: Currently you have to select 'Testing' in the addons settings.
messages.EnableMMD.label: Mmd_tools is not enabled!
messages.EnableMMD.required1: The plugin "mmd_tools" is required for this function.
messages.XpsToolsButton.label: Download XPS Tools
messages.SourceToolsButton.label: Download Source Tools
messages.VrmToolsButton.label: Download VRM Importer
messages.ExportModel.label: Export Model
messages.ExportModel.desc:
Export this model as .fbx for Unity.

Automatically sets the optimal export settings
messages.ExportModel.error.notEnabled: FBX Exporter not enabled! Please enable it in your User Preferences.
messages.ErrorDisplay.label: Warning:
messages.ErrorDisplay.polygons2: You have {number} tris in this model, but you shouldn't have more than 70,000!
messages.ErrorDisplay.polygons3: You should decimate before you export this model.
messages.ErrorDisplay.materials3: You should try to have a maximum of 4 materials on your model.
messages.ErrorDisplay.materials4: Creating a texture atlas in CATS is very easy, so please make use of it.
messages.ErrorDisplay.meshes3: It is not very optimized and might cause lag for you and others!
messages.ErrorDisplay.meshes3_alt: It is extremely unoptimized and will cause lagg for you and others!
messages.ErrorDisplay.meshes4: You should always join your meshes, it's very easy:
messages.ErrorDisplay.JoinMeshes.label: Join Meshes
messages.ErrorDisplay.brokenShapekeys3: You will not be able to upload this model until you fix these shapekeys.
messages.ErrorDisplay.brokenShapekeys4: Either delete or repair them before export.
messages.ErrorDisplay.textures2: This model has no textures assigned but you have 'Embed Textures' enabled.
messages.ErrorDisplay.textures3: Therefore, no textures will be embedded into the FBX.
messages.ErrorDisplay.textures4: This is not an issue, but you will have to import the textures manually into Unity.
messages.ErrorDisplay.eyes2: The mesh '{name}' has Eye Tracking shapekeys but is not named 'Body'.
messages.ErrorDisplay.eyes2_alt: Multiple meshes have Eye Tracking shapekeys but are not named 'Body'.
messages.ErrorDisplay.eyes3: If you want Eye Tracking to work, rename this mesh to 'Body'.
messages.ErrorDisplay.eyes3_alt: Make sure that the mesh containing the eyes is named 'Body' in order
messages.ErrorDisplay.eyes4_alt: to get Eye Tracking to work.
messages.CombineMaterialsButton.label: Combine Same Materials
messages.CombineMaterialsButton.desc:
Combines similar materials into one, reducing draw calls.
Your avatar should visibly look the same after this operation.
This is a very important step for optimizing your avatar.
If you have problems with this, please tell us!
messages.ConvertAllToPngButton.label: Convert Textures to PNG
messages.ConvertAllToPngButton.desc:
Converts all texture files into PNG files.
This helps with transparency and compatibility issues.

The converted image files will be saved next to the old ones
messages.CreateEyesButton.label: Create Eye Tracking
messages.CreateEyesButton.desc:
This will let you track someone when they come close to you and it enables blinking.
You should do decimation before this operation.
Test the resulting eye movement in the 'Testing' tab.
DO NOT USE FOR VRCHAT SDK3 AVATARS
messages.CreateEyesButton.error.noShapeSelected:
You have no shape keys selected.
Please choose a mesh containing shape keys or check "Disable Eye Blinking".
messages.CreateEyesButton.error.noVertex:
The bone "{bone}" has no existing vertex group or no vertices assigned to it.
This might be because you selected the wrong mesh or the wrong bone.
Also make sure that the selected eye bones actually move the eyes in pose mode.
messages.CreateEyesButton.error.dontUse:
Please do not use "{eyeName}" as the input bone.
If you are sure that you want to use that bone please rename it to "{eyeNameShort}".
messages.CreateEyesButton.error.hierarchy:
Eye tracking will not work unless the bone hierarchy is exactly as following: Hips > Spine > Chest > Neck > Head
Furthermore the mesh containing the eyes has to be called "Body" and the armature "Armature".
messages.StartTestingButton.label: Start Eye Testing
messages.StartTestingButton.desc:
This will let you test how the eye movement will look ingame.
Don't forget to stop the Testing process afterwards.
Bones "LeftEye" and "RightEye" are required.
messages.StopTestingButton.label: Stop Eye Testing
messages.StopTestingButton.error.tryAgain: Something went wrong. Please try eye testing again.
messages.ResetRotationButton.label: Reset Rotation
messages.AdjustEyesButton.label: Set Range
messages.AdjustEyesButton.desc:
Lets you re-adjust the movement range of the eyes.
This gets saved
messages.AdjustEyesButton.error.noVertex:
The bone "{bone}" has no existing vertex group or no vertices assigned to it.
This might be because you selected the wrong mesh or the wrong bone.
Also make sure to join your meshes before creating eye tracking and make sure that the eye bones actually move the eyes in pose mode.
messages.StartIrisHeightButton.label: Start Iris Height Adjustment
messages.StartIrisHeightButton.desc:
Lets you readjust the distance of the iris from the eye ball.
Use this to fix clipping of the iris into the eye ball.
This gets saved.
messages.TestBlinking.label: Test
messages.TestBlinking.desc: This lets you see how eye blinking will look in-game.
messages.TestLowerlid.label: Test
messages.TestLowerlid.desc: This lets you see how lowerlids will look in-game.
messages.ResetBlinkTest.label: Reset Shapes
messages.RootButton.label: Parent Bones
messages.RootButton.desc:
This will duplicate the parent of the bones and reparent them to the duplicate.
Very useful for Dynamic Bones.
messages.RefreshRootButton.label: Refresh List
messages.RefreshRootButton.desc: This will clear the group bones list cache and rebuild it, useful if bones have changed or your model.
messages.RefreshRootButton.success: Root bones refreshed, check the root bones list again.
messages.RevertChangesButton.label: Revert Settings
messages.RevertChangesButton.desc: Revert the changes back to how they were on Blender start-up.
messages.ResetGoogleDictButton.label: Clear Local Google Translations
messages.ResetGoogleDictButton.desc: Deletes all currently saved Google Translations. You can't undo this
messages.DebugTranslations.label: Debug Google Translations
messages.DebugTranslations.desc:
Tests Google translations and prints the response into a file called 'google-response.txt' located in the cats addon folder > resources
This button is only visible in the cats development version
messages.DebugTranslations.success: No issues with Google Translations found, response printed!
messages.ShapeKeyApplier.label: Apply Selected Shapekey to Basis
messages.ShapeKeyApplier.desc: Applies the selected shape key to the new Basis at it's current strength and creates a reverted shape key from the selected one
messages.ShapeKeyApplier.error.recursiveRelativeT: Shapekey "{name}" is recursively relative to itself, so cannot be applied to the Basis
messages.ShapeKeyApplier.successRemoved: Successfully removed shapekey "{name}" from the Basis.
messages.ShapeKeyApplier.successSet: Successfully applied shapekey "{name}" to the Basis.
messages.ShapeKeyPruner.label: Remove Unused Shapekeys
messages.ShapeKeyPruner.desc: Removes unused shapekeys that don't affect the mesh, must select the mesh before use.
messages.addToShapekeyMenu.ShapeKeyApplier.label: Apply Selected Shapekey to Basis
messages.addToShapekeyMenu.ShapeKeyPruner.label: Remove Unused Shapekeys
messages.TranslateShapekeyButton.label: Translate Shape Keys
messages.TranslateShapekeyButton.desc: Translates all shape keys using the internal dictionary and Google Translate into English
messages.TranslateBonesButton.label: Translate Bones
messages.TranslateBonesButton.desc: Translates all bones using the internal dictionary and Google Translate into English
messages.TranslateObjectsButton.label: Translate Meshes & Objects
messages.TranslateObjectsButton.desc: Translates all meshes and objects using the internal dictionary and Google Translate into English
messages.TranslateMaterialsButton.label: Translate Materials
messages.TranslateMaterialsButton.desc: Translates all materials using the internal dictionary and Google Translate into English
messages.TranslateTexturesButton.label: Translate Textures
messages.TranslateTexturesButton.desc: Translates all textures using the internal dictionary and Google Translate into English
messages.TranslateTexturesButton.error.noInternet: Could not connect to Google. Please check your internet connection.
messages.TranslateAllButton.label: Translate Everything
messages.TranslateAllButton.desc: Translates everything using the internal dictionary and Google Translate into English
messages.TranslateX.error.wrongVersion: You need Blender 2.79 or higher for this function.
messages.update_dictionary.error.cantConnect: Could not connect to Google. Some parts could not be translated.
messages.update_dictionary.error.temporaryBan: It looks like you got banned from Google Translate temporarily!
messages.update_dictionary.error.catsTranslated: Cats translated what it could with the local dictionary, but you will have to try again later for the Google translations.
messages.update_dictionary.error.cantAccess: Cats was not able to access Google Translate!
messages.update_dictionary.error.errorMsg: You got an error message from Google Translate!
messages.update_dictionary.error.apiChanged:
Could not get translations from Google Translate!
This means that Google changed their API and translations will no longer work until this is fixed.
Please translate manually or wait for a CATS update.
For updates and discussions please join our Discord. The link can be found in the Credits panel down below.
messages.AutoVisemeButton.label: Create Visemes
messages.AutoVisemeButton.desc:
This will give your avatar the ability to mimic each sound that comes from your mouth by blending between various shapes to mimic your actual voice.
It will generate 15 shape keys from the 3 shape keys you specify
messages.AutoVisemeButton.error.selectShapekeys: Please select the correct mouth shapekeys instead of "Basis"!
messages.Scene.eye_mode.label: Eye Mode
messages.Scene.eye_mode.creation.label: Creation
messages.Scene.eye_mode.creation.desc: Here you can create eye tracking.
messages.Scene.eye_mode.testing.label: Testing
messages.Scene.eye_mode.testing.desc: Here you can test how eye tracking will look in-game.
messages.Scene.mesh_name_eye.label: Mesh
messages.Scene.mesh_name_eye.desc: The mesh with the eyes vertex groups
messages.Scene.head.label: Head
messages.Scene.head.desc: The head bone containing the eye bones
messages.Scene.wink_left.label: Blink Left
messages.Scene.wink_left.desc: The shape key containing a blink with the left eye
messages.Scene.wink_right.label: Blink Right
messages.Scene.wink_right.desc: The shape key containing a blink with the right eye
messages.Scene.lowerlid_left.label: Lowerlid Left
messages.Scene.lowerlid_left.desc:
The shape key containing a slightly raised left lower lid.
Can be set to "Basis" to disable lower lid movement
messages.Scene.lowerlid_right.label: Lowerlid Right
messages.Scene.lowerlid_right.desc:
The shape key containing a slightly raised right lower lid.
Can be set to "Basis" to disable lower lid movement
messages.Scene.disable_eye_movement.label: Disable Eye Movement
messages.Scene.disable_eye_movement.desc:
IMPORTANT: Do your decimation first if you check this!

Disables eye movement. Useful if you only want blinking.
This creates eye bones with no movement bound to them.
You still have to assign "LeftEye" and "RightEye" to the eyes in Unity
messages.Scene.disable_eye_blinking.label: Disable Eye Blinking
messages.Scene.disable_eye_blinking.desc:
Disables eye blinking. Useful if you only want eye movement.
This will create the necessary shape keys but leaves them empty
messages.Scene.eye_distance.label: Eye Movement Range
messages.Scene.eye_distance.desc:
Higher = more eye movement
Lower = less eye movement
Warning: Too little or too much range can glitch the eyes.
Test your results in the "Eye Testing"-Tab!
messages.Scene.eye_rotation_x.label: Up - Down
messages.Scene.eye_rotation_x.desc: Rotate the eye bones on the vertical axis
messages.Scene.eye_rotation_y.label: Left - Right
messages.Scene.eye_rotation_y.desc:
Rotate the eye bones on the horizontal axis.
This is from your own point of view
messages.Scene.iris_height.label: Iris Height
messages.Scene.iris_height.desc: Moves the iris away from the eye ball
messages.Scene.eye_blink_shape.label: Blink Strength
messages.Scene.eye_blink_shape.desc: Test the blinking of the eye
messages.Scene.eye_lowerlid_shape.label: Lowerlid Strength
messages.Scene.eye_lowerlid_shape.desc: Test the lowerlid blinking of the eye
messages.Scene.armature.label: Armature
messages.Scene.armature.desc: Select the armature which will be used by Cats
messages.Scene.zip_content.label: Zip Content
messages.Scene.zip_content.desc: Select the model you want to import
messages.Scene.keep_upper_chest.label: Keep Upper Chest
messages.Scene.keep_upper_chest.desc:
VRChat now partially supports the Upper Chest bone, so deleting it is no longer necessary.

Uncheck this if you are going to use the legacy SDK2 avatar system. Most people can leave this on.
messages.Scene.combine_mats.label: Combine Same Materials
messages.Scene.combine_mats.desc:
Combines similar materials into one, reducing draw calls.

Your avatar should visibly look the same after this operation.
This is a very important step for optimizing your avatar.
If you have problems with this, uncheck this option and tell us!
messages.Scene.remove_zero_weight.label: Remove Zero Weight Bones
messages.Scene.remove_zero_weight.desc:
Cleans up the bones hierarchy, deleting all bones that don't directly affect any vertices.
Uncheck this if bones or vertex groups that you want to keep got deleted
messages.Scene.keep_end_bones.label: Keep End Bones
messages.Scene.keep_end_bones.desc:
Saves end bones from deletion.

This can improve skirt movement for dynamic bones, but increases the bone count.
This can also fix issues with crumbled finger bones in Unity.
Make sure to always uncheck "Add Leaf Bones" when exporting or use the CATS export button
messages.Scene.keep_twist_bones.label: Keep Twist Bones
messages.Scene.keep_twist_bones.desc:
This will keep any bone with "Twist" in the name.
So if there are certain bones that you want to keep, you can add "Twist" to them and they won't get deleted.

VRChat can now make use of twist bones, so you can use this option to keep them
messages.Scene.fix_twist_bones.label: Fix MMD Twist Bones
messages.Scene.fix_twist_bones.desc:
This will make MMD arm twist bones usable in VRChat.
Will only work if the twist bones are properly named.
Required names:
 - ArmTwist[1-3]_[L/R]
 - HandTwist[1-3]_[L/R]

You don't need to enable "Keep Twist Bones" for this to work
messages.Scene.join_meshes.label: Join Meshes
messages.Scene.join_meshes.desc:
Joins all meshes of this model together.
It also:
  - Applies all transformations
  - Repairs broken armature modifiers
  - Applies all decimation and mirror modifiers
  - Merges UV maps correctly

INFO: You should always join your meshes
messages.Scene.connect_bones.label: Connect Bones
messages.Scene.connect_bones.desc:
This connects all bones to their child bone if they have exactly one child bone.
This will not change how the bones function in any way, it just improves the aesthetic of the armature
messages.Scene.fix_materials.label: Fix Materials
messages.Scene.fix_materials.desc: This will apply some VRChat related fixes to materials
messages.Scene.delete_zero_weight_keep_twists.des: When checked any bones with _twist or Twist in it's name will be kept. This is too ensure twist bones are kept
messages.Scene.remove_rigidbodies_joints.label: Remove Rigidbodies and Joints
messages.Scene.remove_rigidbodies_joints.desc:
Rigidbodies and joints are used by MMD software to simulate physics.
They are completely useless for VRChat, so removing them is recommended for VRChat users!
messages.Scene.use_google_only.label: Use Old Translations (not recommended)
messages.Scene.use_google_only.desc:
Ignores the internal dictionary and only uses the Google Translator for shape key translations.

This will result in slower translation speed and worse translations, but the translations will be like in CATS version 0.9.0 and older.
Only use this if you have animations which rely on the old translations and you don't want to convert them to the new ones
messages.Scene.show_more_options.label: Show More Options
messages.Scene.merge_mode.label: Merge Mode
messages.Scene.merge_mode.armature.label: Merge Armatures
messages.Scene.merge_mode.armature.desc: Here you can merge two armatures together.
messages.Scene.merge_mode.mesh.label: Attach Mesh
messages.Scene.merge_mode.mesh.desc: Here you can attach a mesh to an armature.
messages.Scene.merge_armature_into.label: Base Armature
messages.Scene.merge_armature_into.desc: Select the armature into which the other armature will be merged
messages.Scene.merge_armature.label: Merge Armature
messages.Scene.merge_armature.desc: Select the armature which will be merged into the selected armature above
messages.Scene.attach_to_bone.label: Attach to Bone
messages.Scene.attach_to_bone.desc: Select the bone to which the armature will be attached to
messages.Scene.attach_mesh.label: Attach Mesh
messages.Scene.attach_mesh.desc: Select the mesh which will be attached to the selected bone in the selected armature
messages.Scene.merge_same_bones.label: Merge All Bones
messages.Scene.merge_same_bones.desc:
Merges all bones together that have the same name instead of only the base bones (Hips, Spine, etc).
You will have to make sure that all the bones you want to merge have the same name.

If this is checked, you won't need to fix the model with CATS beforehand but it is still advised to do so.
If this is unchecked, CATS will only merge the base bones (Hips, Spine, etc).

This can have unintended side effects, so check your model afterwards!
messages.Scene.apply_transforms.label: Apply Transforms
messages.Scene.apply_transforms.desc:
Check this if both armatures and meshes are already at their correct positions.
This will cause them to stay exactly where they are when merging
messages.Scene.merge_armatures_join_meshes.label: Join Meshes
messages.Scene.merge_armatures_join_meshes.desc:
This will join all meshes.
Not checking this will always apply transforms
messages.Scene.merge_armatures_remove_zero_weight:
Cleans up the bones hierarchy, deleting all bones that don't directly affect any vertices.
Uncheck this if bones or vertex groups that you want to keep got deleted
messages.Scene.merge_armatures_cleanup_shape_keys:
Cleans up the meshes shape keys.
Uncheck this if shape keys you want to keep got deleted
messages.Scene.decimation_mode.label: Decimation Mode
messages.Scene.decimation_mode.safe.label: Safe
messages.Scene.decimation_mode.safe.desc:
Decent results - no shape key loss

This will only decimate meshes with no shape keys.
The results are decent and you won't lose any shape keys.
Eye Tracking and Lip Syncing will be fully preserved.
messages.Scene.decimation_mode.half.label: Half
messages.Scene.decimation_mode.half.desc:
Good results - minimal shape key loss

This will only decimate meshes with less than 4 shape keys as those are often not used.
The results are better but you will lose the shape keys in some meshes.
Eye Tracking and Lip Syncing should still work.
messages.Scene.decimation_mode.full.label: Full
messages.Scene.decimation_mode.full.desc:
Consistent results - full shape key loss

This will decimate your whole model deleting all shape keys in the process.
This will give consistent results but you will lose the ability to add blinking and Lip Syncing.
Eye Tracking will still work if you disable Eye Blinking.
messages.Scene.decimation_mode.custom.label: Custom
messages.Scene.decimation_mode.custom.desc:
Custom results - custom shape key loss

This will let you choose which meshes and shape keys should not be decimated.
messages.Scene.selection_mode.label: Selection Mode
messages.Scene.selection_mode.shapekeys.label: Shape Keys
messages.Scene.selection_mode.shapekeys.desc: Select all the shape keys you want to preserve here.
messages.Scene.selection_mode.meshes.label: Meshes
messages.Scene.selection_mode.meshes.desc: Select all the meshes you don't want to decimate here.
messages.Scene.add_shape_key.label: Shape
messages.Scene.add_shape_key.desc: The shape key you want to keep
messages.Scene.add_mesh.label: Mesh
messages.Scene.add_mesh.desc: The mesh you want to leave untouched by the decimation
messages.Scene.decimate_fingers.label: Save Fingers
messages.Scene.decimate_fingers.desc:
Check this if you don't want to decimate your fingers!
Results will be worse but there will be no issues with finger movement.
This is probably only useful if you have a VR headset.

This operation requires the finger bones to be named specifically:
Thumb(0-2)_(L/R)
IndexFinger(1-3)_(L/R)
MiddleFinger(1-3)_(L/R)
RingFinger(1-3)_(L/R)
LittleFinger(1-3)_(L/R)
messages.Scene.decimate_hands.label: Save Hands
messages.Scene.decimate_hands.desc:
Check this if you don't want to decimate your full hands!
Results will be worse but there will be no issues with hand movement.
This is probably only useful if you have a VR headset.

This operation requires the finger and hand bones to be named specifically:
Left/Right wrist
Thumb(0-2)_(L/R)
IndexFinger(1-3)_(L/R)
MiddleFinger(1-3)_(L/R)
RingFinger(1-3)_(L/R)
LittleFinger(1-3)_(L/R)
messages.Scene.decimation_remove_doubles.label: Remove Doubles
messages.Scene.decimation_remove_doubles.desc: Uncheck this if you get issues with this checked
messages.Scene.decimation_retain_separated_meshes: Experimental option. Keep existing meshes as separate objects throughout decimation
messages.Scene.max_tris.label: Tris
messages.Scene.max_tris.desc: The target amount of tris after decimation
messages.Scene.mesh_name_viseme.label: Mesh
messages.Scene.mesh_name_viseme.desc: The mesh with the mouth shape keys
messages.Scene.mouth_a.label: Viseme AA
messages.Scene.mouth_a.desc:
Shape key containing mouth movement that looks like someone is saying "aa".
Do not put empty shape keys like "Basis" in here
messages.Scene.mouth_o.label: Viseme OH
messages.Scene.mouth_o.desc:
Shape key containing mouth movement that looks like someone is saying "oh".
Do not put empty shape keys like "Basis" in here
messages.Scene.mouth_ch.label: Viseme CH
messages.Scene.mouth_ch.desc:
Shape key containing mouth movement that looks like someone is saying "ch". Opened lips and clenched teeth.
Do not put empty shape keys like "Basis" in here
messages.Scene.shape_intensity.label: Shape Key Mix Intensity
messages.Scene.shape_intensity.desc: Controls the strength in the creation of the shape keys. Lower for less mouth movement strength
messages.Scene.root_bone.label: To Parent
messages.Scene.root_bone.desc: List of bones that look like they could be parented together to a root bone
messages.Scene.optimize_mode.label: Optimize Mode
messages.Scene.optimize_mode.atlas.label: Atlas
messages.Scene.optimize_mode.atlas.desc: Allows you to make a texture atlas.
messages.Scene.optimize_mode.material.label: Material And Meshes
messages.Scene.optimize_mode.material.desc: Some various options on material and mesh manipulation.
messages.Scene.optimize_mode.bonemerging.label: Bones
messages.Scene.merge_ratio.label: Merge Ratio
messages.Scene.merge_ratio.desc:
Higher = more bones will be merged
Lower = less bones will be merged
messages.Scene.merge_mesh.label: Mesh
messages.Scene.merge_mesh.desc: The mesh with the bones vertex groups
messages.Scene.merge_bone.label: To Merge
messages.Scene.merge_bone.desc: List of bones that look like they could be merged together to reduce overall bones
messages.Scene.show_mmd_tabs.label: Show mmd_tools
messages.Scene.show_mmd_tabs.desc: Allows you to hide/show the mmd_tools tabs "MMD" and "Misc"
messages.Scene.embed_textures.label: Embed Textures on Export
messages.Scene.embed_textures.desc:
Enable this to embed the texture files into the FBX file upon export.
Unity will automatically extract these textures and put them into a separate folder.
This might not work for everyone and it increases the file size of the exported FBX file
messages.Scene.ui_lang.label: Cats Language
messages.Scene.ui_lang.desc: Lets you select which language the Cats interface should have
messages.Scene.use_custom_mmd_tools.label: Use Custom mmd_tools
messages.Scene.use_custom_mmd_tools.desc: Enable this to use your own version of mmd_tools. This will disable the internal cats mmd_tools
messages.Scene.debug_translations.label: Debug Google Translations
messages.Scene.debug_translations.desc: Tests the Google Translations and prints the Google response in case of error
messages.Scene.shapekeycsv.label: Export Translations To CSV
messages.Scene.customfoldershapekeycsv.label: Custom CSV Export Location
messages.Scene.customfoldershapekeycsv.desc: Choose your own location to export for the shape keys CSV to be.
messages.Scene.shapekeycsv.desc: When checked CATS will export translations to a CSV file located in documents - CATS. Note you can set your own path
messages.CheckForUpdateButton.label: Check now for Update
messages.CheckForUpdateButton.desc: Checks if a new update is available for CATS
messages.UpdateToLatestButton.label: Update Now
messages.UpdateToLatestButton.desc: Update CATS to the latest version
messages.UpdateToSelectedButton.label: Update to Selected version
messages.UpdateToSelectedButton.desc: Update CATS to the selected version
messages.UpdateToDevButton.label: Update to Development version
messages.UpdateToDevButton.desc: Update CATS to the Development version
messages.RemindMeLaterButton.label: Remind me later
messages.RemindMeLaterButton.desc: This hides the update notification 'til the next Blender restart
messages.IgnoreThisVersionButton.label: Ignore this version
messages.IgnoreThisVersionButton.desc: This ignores this version. You will be reminded again when the next version releases
messages.ShowPatchnotesPanel.label: Patchnotes
messages.ShowPatchnotesPanel.desc: Shows the patchnotes of the selected version
messages.ConfirmUpdatePanel.label: Confirm Update
messages.ConfirmUpdatePanel.desc: This shows you a panel in which you have to confirm your update choice
messages.ConfirmUpdatePanel.warn.dev2: The development version of CATS is the place where
messages.ConfirmUpdatePanel.warn.dev3: we test new features and bug fixes.
messages.ConfirmUpdatePanel.warn.dev4: This version might be very unstable and some features
messages.UpdateCompletePanel.label: Installation Report
messages.UpdateCompletePanel.success2: Restart Blender to complete the update.
messages.UpdateCompletePanel.failure2: See Updater Panel for more info.
messages.UpdateNotificationPopup.label: Update available
messages.UpdateNotificationPopup.desc: This shows you that an update is available
messages.check_for_update.cantCheck: Could not check for updates, try again later
messages.download_file.cantFindZip: Could not find the downloaded zip
messages.download_file.cantFindCATS: Could not find CATS in the downloaded zip
messages.bpy.types.Scene.cats_updater_version_lis: Select the version you want to install
messages.bpy.types.Scene.cats_update_action.label: Choose action
messages.bpy.types.Scene.cats_update_action.updat: Updates now to the latest version
messages.bpy.types.Scene.cats_update_action.ignor: This ignores this version. You will be reminded again when the next version releases
messages.bpy.types.Scene.cats_update_action.defer: Hides the update notification until the next Blender restart
messages.DecimationPanel.preset.excellent.label: Excellent
messages.DecimationPanel.preset.excellent.descrip: The maximum number of tris you can have for an Excellent rating.
messages.DecimationPanel.preset.good.label: Good
messages.DecimationPanel.preset.good.description: The maximum number of tris you can have for a Good rating.
messages.DecimationPanel.preset.quest.label: Quest
messages.DecimationPanel.preset.quest.description:
The recommended number of tris for Quest avatars.
merge_visible_meshes_only,Merge Visible Meshes Only"
messages.select_this_to_keep_the_bones_after_merg: Select this to keep the bones after merging them to their parents or to the active bone
messages.select_this_to_only_merge_the_weights_of: Select this to only merge the weights of the visible meshes
messages.RemoveRigidbodiesJointsOperator.label: Remove Rigidbodies and Joints
messages.RemoveRigidbodiesJointsOperator.descript:
Rigidbodies and joints are used by MMD software to simulate physics. 
They are completely useless for VRChat, so removing them is recommended for VRChat users!
